t:
“Please! Take me instead of him.” I cried at the men who took my son.




“Sorry sir, only women and children are allowed” they said,

as the last lifeboat on the ship started filling up.
c:
If I was going to die, I'm taking everyone with me, I thought, as I pointed the flare gun towards the lifeboat.
